name: part_008
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe introduces the second part of her live dubbing (afreco) session.
A preview of the footage to be dubbed is shown.
Sakamata Chloe expresses her nervousness and prepares for the live dubbing.
The live dubbing session takes place with Sakamata Chloe voicing her character and Laplus Darkness making a cameo.
After the dubbing, Chloe welcomes Mori Calliope as a guest to the stage.
Sakamata Chloe and Mori Calliope perform the song 'database'.

subtitles.original: 1本目は猫ずこうもなんとなく覚えてたんですけど、
subtitles.english: I vaguely remembered 'Neko Zukou' for the first one,

subtitles.original: 2本目めちゃくちゃセリフ多いです。
subtitles.english: but the second one has a ton of lines.

subtitles.original: 2本目こちら！
subtitles.english: Here's the second one!

subtitles.original: サカマタ生アフレコ
subtitles.english: Sakamata Live Dubbing

subtitles.original: 2022/11/20 実体の無い雑魚に負けるわけない！……よね？
subtitles.english: Nov 20, 2022 - There's no way I'd lose to a non-existent small fry! ...Right?

subtitles.original: では、また実際の映像の一部を見てください。
subtitles.english: Now, please take a look at a portion of the actual footage.

subtitles.original: どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here you go!

subtitles.original: 真っ暗。説明しよう。
subtitles.english: It's pitch black. Let me explain.

subtitles.original: なんか起きたら夜になってて、誰もいないし帰りたいんだけど、
subtitles.english: I woke up and it was night, nobody's around and I want to go home,

subtitles.original: あ、鍵持ってないじゃん。
subtitles.english: but oh, I don't have my keys.

subtitles.original: 流石に戸締りしないのはまずいかなーって。
subtitles.english: I thought it'd be bad not to lock up.

subtitles.original: だから帰るに帰れないわけよ。
subtitles.english: So I just can't go home.

subtitles.original: とりあえず。
subtitles.english: Anyway.

subtitles.original: いや、マジでね、全然覚えてないっすけど。
subtitles.english: No, seriously, I don't remember it at all.

subtitles.original: ちょっとやっていきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: But I'm going to give it a try.

subtitles.original: クソほどセリフあるんで、あの、なんか声が遅れて聞こえてきたらね、
subtitles.english: There are so many lines, so if my voice sounds lagged,

subtitles.original: それはみんなのせいです！
subtitles.english: that's on you guys!

subtitles.original: じゃ、いきます！
subtitles.english: Okay, here I go!

subtitles.original: 真っ暗。説明しよう。
subtitles.english: It's pitch black. Let me explain.

subtitles.original: なんか起きたら夜になってて、誰もいないし帰りたいんだけど、
subtitles.english: I woke up and it was night, nobody's around and I want to go home,

subtitles.original: あ、鍵持ってないじゃん。
subtitles.english: but oh, I don't have my keys.

subtitles.original: 流石に戸締りしないのはまずいかなーって。
subtitles.english: I thought it'd be bad not to lock up.

subtitles.original: だから帰るに帰れないわけよ。
subtitles.english: So I just can't go home.

subtitles.original: とりあえず。
subtitles.english: Anyway.

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: ん？あれ？セリフのある、あれ？
subtitles.english: Mm? Huh? Where there are lines, wait...

subtitles.original: どこで喋ってるんですか？あなた。
subtitles.english: Where are you talking from?

subtitles.original: えっ、した？
subtitles.english: Eh? Below?

subtitles.original: まーじ、タピオカも最近きつそうだもんね。
subtitles.english: Seriously, even Tapioca seems to be having a hard time lately.

subtitles.original: ラップ現象だ。
subtitles.english: It's a poltergeist.

subtitles.original: つまりこの部屋にいるのは...
subtitles.english: In other words, the one in this room is...

subtitles.original: 会いに来るな！
subtitles.english: Don't come to see me!

subtitles.original: だ、しかし、し、し、し、し！
subtitles.english: B-but, h-h-h-h!

subtitles.original: 実体のない雑魚に負けるサカマタで...
subtitles.english: A Sakamata who loses to a non-existent small fry—

subtitles.original: ぎゃあああ！
subtitles.english: AAAAAAAH!

subtitles.original: わしじゃよ。小気味よいシャドウ音が聞こえたのでな。
subtitles.english: It's me. I heard some pleasant shadow sounds.

subtitles.original: サカマタ！
subtitles.english: Sakamata!

subtitles.original: ううう...
subtitles.english: Uuu...

subtitles.original: いや、完璧でしたね。
subtitles.english: Man, that was perfect.

subtitles.original: よかった。
subtitles.english: Glad it went well.

subtitles.original: もう一寸の狂いもなく、はい、いけましたね。
subtitles.english: Not a single error, yup, I nailed it.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫でしたね。
subtitles.english: It was fine, right?

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、サカマタ生アフレコでしたー！
subtitles.english: Alright, and that was the Sakamata Live Dubbing segment!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ではですね、この後ライブがラストスパートに向けて、
subtitles.english: Now, after this, the live performance is going to speed up

subtitles.original: ちょっと加速していくんですけど、
subtitles.english: for the final stretch,

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がっていきますかー！
subtitles.english: but are you guys ready to get even more hyped?!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ではですね、この後なんとゲストの方々にも
subtitles.english: Now, we actually have some guests

subtitles.original: 生配信で出演していただきます。
subtitles.english: who will be appearing on the livestream.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、ゲストの皆さんも含めて一緒に応援しててください。
subtitles.english: Please cheer them on along with me.

subtitles.original: それでは、ラストスパート最初のゲストはこの方です！
subtitles.english: And now, the first guest of the final stretch is... this person!

subtitles.original: コホン、皆さーん！
subtitles.english: Ahem, hello everyone!

subtitles.original: どうもこんばんはー！
subtitles.english: Good evening!

subtitles.original: 森カリオペです。What's up Chloe-chan?
subtitles.english: It's Mori Calliope. What's up, Chloe-chan?

subtitles.original: カリ先輩！
subtitles.english: Calli-senpai!

subtitles.original: いやもう、めっちゃ緊張してましたけど、
subtitles.english: Man, I was so nervous,

subtitles.original: カリ先輩が堂々とこう来てくれて、安心しました、今。
subtitles.english: but seeing Calli-senpai come out so confidently really put me at ease.

subtitles.original: 余裕余裕ですよ。
subtitles.english: Piece of cake, piece of cake.

subtitles.original: ちょっと楽しみましょうよ！
subtitles.english: Let's have some fun!

subtitles.original: Let's go, 派手にぶちかまそうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go out with a bang!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ Let's rock!
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's rock!

subtitles.original: Hey everybody! Are you ready? Let's go!
subtitles.english: Hey everybody! Are you ready? Let's go!

subtitles.original: Counteraction rising
subtitles.english: Counteraction rising

subtitles.original: Yeah we are ready for the punch line
subtitles.english: Yeah we are ready for the punch line

subtitles.original: There's no use with all your gimmicks
subtitles.english: There's no use with all your gimmicks

subtitles.original: So check this out!
subtitles.english: So check this out!

subtitles.original: Login you damned one's
subtitles.english: Login you damned one's

subtitles.original: Crush the won't you come
subtitles.english: Crush the won't you come

subtitles.original: The noise comes we are ready to bow
subtitles.english: The noise comes we are ready to bow

subtitles.original: What about the antidote for the jammed and hypnotized
subtitles.english: What about the antidote for the jammed and hypnotized

subtitles.original: Rend the lie that covers
subtitles.english: Rend the lie that covers

subtitles.original: 咲き乱れた花のように 鮮やかな痛み抱き
subtitles.english: Like flowers blooming in profusion, embracing a vivid pain

subtitles.original: 佇む街を抜け 迷いのセリフは捨て
subtitles.english: Passing through the standing city, throwing away the lines of hesitation

subtitles.original: 帰らない声よ響け We say wow
subtitles.english: Echo, oh voice that won't return! We say wow

subtitles.original: Database, database, just living in the database, wow wow
subtitles.english: Database, database, just living in the database, wow wow

subtitles.original: The wall of pure fictions cracking in my head
subtitles.english: The wall of pure fictions cracking in my head

subtitles.original: And the addiction of my world still spreads
subtitles.english: And the addiction of my world still spreads

subtitles.original: In the database, database, I'm struggling in the database, wow wow
subtitles.english: In the database, database, I'm struggling in the database, wow wow

subtitles.original: It doesn't even matter if there is no hope at all
subtitles.english: It doesn't even matter if there is no hope at all

subtitles.original: As the madness of the system grows
subtitles.english: As the madness of the system grows

subtitles.original: Crack in the key for the real clue
subtitles.english: Crack in the key for the real clue

subtitles.original: Mask presentation reigning on but we know we've been longing for this
subtitles.english: Mask presentation reigning on but we know we've been longing for this

subtitles.original: Cut it out
subtitles.english: Cut it out

subtitles.original: The plot that deceived you
subtitles.english: The plot that deceived you

subtitles.original: Drop the rebel sound
subtitles.english: Drop the rebel sound

subtitles.original: Shut the system down
subtitles.english: Shut the system down

subtitles.original: いつか見た夢を
subtitles.english: A dream I once saw
